title: DoT
summary: DoT is a tabletop mixed-reality game platform with kinetic interaction in the real world.
Users can play the game by touching and moving the marble.
As output, the marble moves with visual graphics of the display.

paragraph: DoT is a tabletop mixed-reality game platform with kinetic interaction in the real world.
